mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COLT_MOVIE( ID, MOVIE_INFO_ID AVG_POINT, CONTENT, COLLECT_DAY, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{movieInfoId}, #{avgPoint}, #{content}, #{collectDay}, #{regDt} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ID = #{id}, MOVIE_INFO_ID = #{movieInfoId}, AVG_POINT = #{avgPoint}, CONTENT = #{content}, COLLECT_DAY = #{collectDay}, REG_DT = #{regDt}
